title: Encode deterministic negative conformance vectors for invalid lowering boundary states
feature: M03 Lane C explicit negative conformance vectors for lowering boundary failures

diagnostics.message: compiled module metadata does not match emitted textual interface

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: negative vectors for callback-order drift, status/error contradiction, and cleanup-count mismatch are explicit and deterministic
strict replay verification fails closed when any declared negative vector is missing
negative vector IDs are stable conformance keys consumed by lowering regression checks
runtime_assertions: callback-order vector fails when completion fields are reordered from canonical tuple
status/error vector fails when success status is paired with non-nil error payload
cleanup-count vector fails when unwind cleanup executes zero or multiple times

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized replay preserves declared negative vector set from -O0
optimization does not suppress strict failure behavior for negative vectors
deterministic negative vector IDs remain stable across optimization modes
runtime_assertions: negative vector failure behavior remains equivalent to -O0 under optimization
missing vector coverage remains a deterministic fail-closed conformance outcome

abi_field_stability.stability_property: canonical callback field order mismatch remains an explicit deterministic negative vector
invalid status/error combinations remain explicit deterministic negative vectors
